body:
@Haadokoaa

Found it in Mangafox :D Anyways for others who might be interested in this gag Kantai comic do a "KANTAI COLLECTION DJ - BOMBER GRAPE'S" search. The jokes is sorta "weird" and alot of punching as usual from the author
It's Bomber Grape indeed. He also does a lot of Touhou stuff.
From the same author who did the gag manga turned anime "Daily Lives of High School Boys" and "ZAI X 10"? The art style is similar and have the crazy bitches theme
